experiences.title: IT Management
experiences.details: Manage information technology and computer systems. Design, develop, implement and coordinate systems, policies and procedures.  Ensure security of data, network access and backup systems.  Act in alignment with user needs and system functionality to contribute to organizational policy.  Identify problematic areas and implement strategic solutions in time, Preserve assets, information security and control structures,
